definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: This effect may be the result of window dressing by the fund managing companies.
sentences.chinese: 這種現象可能與基金的窗飾效應有關。

sentences.english: The drapes blend with the rug.
I got these from fabric sample books that were discarded by our local window-covering shop.
sentences.chinese: 我從附近的窗飾店裏要來了廢棄的布匹樣布圖冊。
